title: Region is applying snapshot for a long time
body:
## Bug Report

```
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.839 +00:00] [INFO] [peer_storage.rs:605] ["begin to apply snapshot"] [peer_id=849059931] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.839 +00:00] [INFO] [peer_storage.rs:1046] ["finish clear peer meta"] [takes=1.958ç¢Œs] [raft_key=1] [apply_key=1] [meta_key=1] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.839 +00:00] [INFO] [peer_storage.rs:688] ["apply snapshot with state ok"] [for_witness=false] [state="applied_index: 186704 commit_index: 2818 commit_term: 6 truncated_state { index: 186704 term: 6 }"] [...] [peer_id=849059931] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.840 +00:00] [INFO] [apply.rs:3918] ["re-register to apply delegates"] [term=6] [peer_id=849059931] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.840 +00:00] [INFO] [peer.rs:4847] ["snapshot is persisted"] [...] [peer_id=849059931] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.840 +00:00] [INFO] [region_info_accessor.rs:313] ["trying to create region but it already exists, try to update it"] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 13:47:50.840 +00:00] [INFO] [peer.rs:4906] ["region changed after persisting snapshot"] [...] [peer_id=849059931] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 14:36:21.032 +00:00] [INFO] [region.rs:444] ["begin apply snap data"] [peer_id=849059931] [region_id=849059930]
[2024/05/11 14:36:22.180 +00:00] [INFO] [region.rs:491] ["apply new data"] [time_takes=95.05161ms] [region_id=849059930]
```
From the log, you can see that region 849059930 begins to apply snapshot at 13:47, but it finally begins to apply snap data in region worker at 14:36, which costs 50mins. 

The region worker isn't overloaded during that time. The number of L0 files is kept at a high level, so it's highly possible that it prevents the snapshot from being ingested for a long time.
